title: Introduction to ADHD Awareness
headline: This free online course explores attention deficit hyperactivity disorder and its treatment with therapy and medication.
description: Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) is a neurobehavioral disorder that has become widely recognised. This course clarifies ADHD and discusses all the components and benefits of understanding this condition. We provide information to assist you in diagnosing the disorder and exploring its various treatments. We explain what the key terms of ADHD are. We answer practical questions relating to the diagnosis of this condition.

courseDescription:
This course on ADHD provides accurate knowledge and awareness of this mental health disorder and demonstrates the working principles of understanding this condition. We describe and clarify the characteristics and functions of this condition's diagnosis and guide you through specific information about treatment affecting you personally. We provide the answers to questions relating to the key symptoms of the disorder, provide a parent’s guide and outline the initial signs to look for when contemplating if your child has ADHD or not. We discuss creating a plan before teaching you to assess the various ways of dealing with ADHD and knowing the differences.

Following this, we will prepare you to learn all about ADHD, allowing you to deal with the problems if it affects a family member or a work colleague. You will understand the effectiveness of cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT) for ADHD. Next, you will research how treatment works and examine the available distinct varieties of therapy. What behaviours emerge with this condition? What tools help you deal with ADHD? This course will clarify these questions before explaining how to live with ADHD successfully. Finally, you will discover the problems of a later or adult diagnosis and the related symptoms like impulsivity. 

This course will equip you with the skills you need to understand ADHD and help you become aware of all the terminology and understanding you need from scratch. It provides precise and detailed techniques you can apply in your working field. This induction in ADHD awareness course is ideal for those with a family member or people who want to understand this disorder better. Register for this training course and become familiar with ADHD and the importance of awareness.
